unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get ready because festival season is heating up! From Kochi to Kolkata, celluloid dreams are about to come alive.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get ready because festival season is heating up! From Kochi to Kolkata, celluloid dreams are about to come alive.

unnormalised: The buzz is all about the upcoming "Golden Peacock" awards at the International Film Festival of India (IFFI) in Goa this November. Will a Bollywood flick finally clinch the top prize, or will international cinema steal the show again?
normalised: The buzz is all about the upcoming "Golden Peacock" awards at the International Film Festival of India (I F F I) in Goa this November. Will a Bollywood flick finally clinch the top prize, or will international cinema steal the show again?

unnormalised: Speaking of regional cinema, the Chennai International Film Festival is also prepping up, promising a showcase of Tamil and global indie films. Word on the street is that there'll be a special screening of films from the Northeast, highlighting the region's rich storytelling traditions.
normalised: Speaking of regional cinema, the Chennai International Film Festival is also prepping up, promising a showcase of Tamil and global indie films. Word on the street is that there'll be a special screening of films from the Northeast, highlighting the region's rich storytelling traditions.

unnormalised: And let's not forget the food! No film fest is complete without some deliciousness. Imagine tucking into some spicy biryani while debating the merits of the latest arthouse drama! Or maybe some Onam Sadhya after a Malayalam film screening?
normalised: And let's not forget the food! No film fest is complete without some deliciousness. Imagine tucking into some spicy biryani while debating the merits of the latest arthouse drama! Or maybe some Onam Sadhya after a Malayalam film screening?

unnormalised: So grab your popcorn (or maybe some masala peanuts!), book those tickets, and get ready for a cinematic rollercoaster ride! It's time to celebrate the art of storytelling, Indian style. And maybe spot a celebrity or two!
normalised: So grab your popcorn (or maybe some masala peanuts!), book those tickets, and get ready for a cinematic rollercoaster ride! It's time to celebrate the art of storytelling, Indian style. And maybe spot a celebrity or two!
